Package de.mycrocast.android.sdk.live.rating

Interface LiveStreamRater

All Superinterfaces:
de.mycrocast.android.sdk.observer.Observable<LiveStreamRater.Observer>
public interface LiveStreamRater extends de.mycrocast.android.sdk.observer.Observable<LiveStreamRater.Observer>
The live stream rater is used for rating related interaction with any live stream. Use it to like/dislike a stream or get the users current rating for a certain stream

  • Method Details

    • Like

      void Like(@Nullable LiveStream liveStream)
      Like a certain stream. If current stream was already liked by the user, reset the rating to neutral
      Parameters:
      liveStream - - the stream to like

    • Dislike

      void Dislike(@Nullable LiveStream liveStream)
      Dislike a certain stream. If the current stream rating was already dislike the rating is reset to neutral
      Parameters:
      liveStream - - the stream to dislike

    • getCurrentRating

      LiveStreamRating getCurrentRating(@Nullable LiveStream liveStream)
      Request the users current rating for the provided live stream
      Parameters:
      liveStream - - the live stream in question
      Returns:
      the rating of the current user for this stream
